snippet.title: Upcoming MMORPG Game: Avalon the Game (Church and Village Teaser)
snippet.description:
The best Unreal Engine fueled mmorpg game with cutting-edge graphics is now listed on Epic games as upcoming project. 

Avalon is an online multiplayer  (MMORPG) built in Unreal 4 and 5 engines. Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players utilize their heros to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for in game coins and rare gear rewards. The game is built around both active  and passive  economies.

Inspired by the legend of King Arthur and the Island of Avalon, this game challenges every player to undertake a thrilling adventure in their quest to ultimately claim their very own seat among the Knights of The Round Table. Along the way, players earn rewards ( in game rare gear or coins) by purchasing, renting, or securing resources as well as collaborating with  landowners to acquire and build in-game real estate.

___________________________________

Join our emailing list
